name: @wtm/agents
description: WTM multi-agent workflow powered by the @openai/agents SDK and Bun runtime.

scripts.electron:build: bun run electron:bundle && bunx vite build --config electron/vite.config.ts
scripts.electron:dev: concurrently -k -r "bunx tsup --config tsup.config.ts --watch" "bunx vite --config electron/vite.config.ts" "wait-on tcp:5173 file:dist/electron/main.cjs && bunx cross-env ELECTRON_RENDERER_URL=http://localhost:5173 electron dist/electron/main.cjs"
scripts.electron:preview: bun run electron:build && bunx electron dist/electron/main.cjs
